# delegate

**Instance Property**

An object that responds to sensor-related events.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any SRSensorReaderDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Responding to sensor events

- **SRSensorReaderDelegate**: A set of callbacks the framework invokes to notify the app of sensor-related events.
